verses.name: Ezekiel 10:15
verses.text: And the cherubims were lifted up. This is the living creature that I saw by the river of Chebar.

verses.name: Ezekiel 10:16
verses.text: And when the cherubims went, the wheels went by them: and when the cherubims lifted up their wings to mount up from the earth, the same wheels also turned not from beside them.

verses.name: Ezekiel 10:17
verses.text: When they stood, these stood; and when they were lifted up, these lifted up themselves also: for the spirit of the living creature was in them.

verses.name: Ezekiel 10:18
verses.text: Then the glory of the Lord departed from off the threshold of the house, and stood over the cherubims.
